## ICreateVerifiablePresentationLDArgs interface

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.

Encapsulates the parameters required to create a [W3C Verifiable Presentation](https://www.w3.org/TR/vc-data-model/#presentations)

This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface ICreateVerifiablePresentationLDArgs extends UsingResolutionOptions
```

**Extends:** [UsingResolutionOptions](./core-types.usingresolutionoptions.md)

## Properties

| Property                                                                                           | Modifiers | Type                                                       | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ---------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [challenge?](./credential-ld.icreateverifiablepresentationldargs.challenge.md)                     |           | string                                                     | **_(BETA)_** _(Optional)_ Optional (only JWT) string challenge parameter to add to the verifiable presentation.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| [domain?](./credential-ld.icreateverifiablepresentationldargs.domain.md)                           |           | string                                                     | **_(BETA)_** _(Optional)_ Optional string domain parameter to add to the verifiable presentation.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| [fetchRemoteContexts?](./credential-ld.icreateverifiablepresentationldargs.fetchremotecontexts.md) |           | boolean                                                    | <p>**_(BETA)_** _(Optional)_ Set this to true if you want the <code>@context</code> URLs to be fetched in case they are not preloaded.</p><p>Defaults to <code>false</code></p>                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| [keyRef?](./credential-ld.icreateverifiablepresentationldargs.keyref.md)                           |           | string                                                     | **_(BETA)_** _(Optional)_ Optional. The key handle ([IKey.kid](./core-types.ikey.kid.md)) from the internal database.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| [presentation](./credential-ld.icreateverifiablepresentationldargs.presentation.md)                |           | [PresentationPayload](./core-types.presentationpayload.md) | <p>**_(BETA)_** The json payload of the Presentation according to the [canonical model](https://www.w3.org/TR/vc-data-model/#presentations).</p><p>The signer of the Presentation is chosen based on the <code>holder</code> property of the <code>presentation</code></p><p><code>@context</code>, <code>type</code> and <code>issuanceDate</code> will be added automatically if omitted.</p> |
